choose.when: AND ((fb.created_at BETWEEN #{search.startDate} AND #{search.endDate}) OR (fb.modified_at BETWEEN #{search.startDate} AND #{search.endDate}))
choose.otherwise: AND ((fb.created_at BETWEEN SUBDATE(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND NOW()) OR (fb.modified_at BETWEEN SUBDATE(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND NOW()))

where.if: AND ( fb.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search.keyWord}, '%') OR fb.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search.keyWord}, '%') OR m.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search.keyWord}, '%'))

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_board ( title, content, views, member_id, created_at, modified_at, category_id ) VALUES ( #{freeBoard.title}, #{freeBoard.content}, 0, #{memberId}, NOW(), NOW(), ( SELECT category.category_id FROM category WHERE category.value = #{freeBoard.category} AND category.board_type = 'free' ) )
mapper.select: SELECT free_board_id, title, content, views, created_at, modified_at, ct.value as 'category', m.name as 'member.name', m.member_id as 'member.memberId' FROM free_board fb LEFT JOIN category ct on fb.category_id = ct.category_id LEFT JOIN member m on m.member_id = fb.member_id WHERE free_board_id = #{freeBoardId}
SELECT count(*) FROM free_board fb LEFT JOIN category ct on fb.category_id = ct.category_id LEFT JOIN member m on m.member_id = fb.member_id
SELECT count(*) > 0 FROM comment c WHERE c.free_board_id = #{freeBoardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE free_board fb SET fb.content = NULL, fb.member_id = NULL WHERE free_board_id = #{freeBoardId}

UPDATE free_board SET category_id = (SELECT category.category_id FROM category WHERE category.value = #{freeBoard.category}), title = #{freeBoard.title}, content = #{freeBoard.content}, modified_at = NOW() WHERE free_board_id = #{freeBoardId}
UPDATE free_board SET title = '[관리자에 의해 삭제된 게시글입니다.]', content = ' ', modified_at = NOW() WHERE free_board_id = #{freeBoardId}
